entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
